markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eclectic Obsession](/Feats.aspx?ID=995) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Gnome Obsession](/Feats.aspx?ID=29)

</column>

---

Your desire for stimulation has led you from one pursuit to another and granted you a smattering of expertise with myriad crafts and professions. You reflect on snippets you’ve learned to temporarily become trained in one [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill of your choice. This proficiency lasts for 10 minutes or until you critically fail a check with that skill. Since this training is temporary, you can’t use it as a prerequisite for a permanent character option like a feat or a skill increase.
name: Eclectic Obsession
